ValidationRule.description: Lock sales from moving to closed won
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
TEXT(StageName) = "5 - Sales Closed Won",
TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) != "4 - Close Opportunity",
NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Admin")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance"))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Editing opportunities at Stage 5 - Sales Closed Won is restricted to Finance profiles. Please consult DealDesk if further edits are required.
